Title: 2013 Gibson Les Paul Studio 70's Tribute Gold Top Dirty fingers pickups USA
ConditionDescription: Great playing guitar, in good condition, upgraded with old school kluson tuners- plays great with a straight, fast playing neck with minimal fret wear for years of life!- gold top, sounds very good- clean original electronics!- comes with Gibson bag- finish designed to wear and relic naturally, and it has started to wear on the top edges & sides, which gives it a vintage look- has some wear, and a few scratches on the head stock front, back, & sides- and a good amount of buckle wear on the back of body, some hazing on body top, behind the bridge- and two small screw holes near rear strap button- has customized recessed front strap button, and a few edge flakes missing around the entire piece- original tunomatic bridge- case has a bit of shelf wear but still clean- Please Click on pix to see a larger view!-
